name: Manchester City
description: Manchester City Football Club is an English football club based in Manchester that competes in the Premier League. Founded in 1880, they have won multiple Premier League titles under Pep Guardiola, known for their possession-based style of play.

name: Liverpool
description: Liverpool Football Club is a professional football club based in Liverpool, England. The club has won six European Cups, more than any other English club, along with nineteen League titles. Known for their high-pressing style under Jürgen Klopp.

name: Chelsea
description: Chelsea Football Club is an English professional football club based in Fulham, London. Founded in 1905, the club competes in the Premier League. Known for their solid defensive organization and tactical flexibility.

name: Arsenal
description: Arsenal Football Club is a professional football club based in Islington, London. Arsenal has won 13 league titles, a record 14 FA Cups, and two League Cups. The club has evolved their style from Wenger's possession-focused approach to a more balanced system under Arteta.

name: Tottenham Hotspur
description: Tottenham Hotspur Football Club, commonly referred to as Tottenham or Spurs, is based in North London. Known for their attacking football traditions but tactically versatile under different managers in recent years.

name: Manchester United
description: Manchester United Football Club is a professional football club based in Manchester, England. One of the most successful clubs in English football history, known for their attacking traditions and counter-attacking style.

name: Barcelona
description: FC Barcelona is a professional football club based in Barcelona, Spain. Known for its historically significant 'tiki-taka' style of play, emphasizing possession with quick, short passes and movement.

name: Real Madrid
description: Real Madrid Club de Fútbol is a professional football club based in Madrid, Spain. The most successful club in European Cup/Champions League history with 14 titles, known for their attacking football and star players.

name: Atletico Madrid
description: Club Atlético de Madrid is a Spanish professional football club based in Madrid. Known for their defensive solidity, disciplined organization, and counter-attacking style under long-time manager Diego Simeone.

name: Bayern Munich
description: FC Bayern Munich is a German professional sports club based in Munich, Bavaria. Germany's most successful club and one of the most successful in Europe, known for their high-pressing, dominant style of play.

name: Borussia Dortmund
description: Borussia Dortmund is a German professional sports club based in Dortmund. Known for their high-intensity attacking football, focus on developing young talents, and the famous 'Yellow Wall' of fans.

name: RB Leipzig
description: RB Leipzig is a German professional football club based in Leipzig, Saxony. Founded in 2009, they have risen rapidly through the German football league system. Known for their high-pressing, transition-oriented style of play and focus on developing young talent.

name: Paris Saint-Germain
description: Paris Saint-Germain Football Club is a French professional football club based in Paris. One of France's most successful clubs, known for their star-studded lineup and possession-based attacking style.

name: Juventus
description: Juventus Football Club is an Italian professional football club based in Turin, Piedmont. One of the most decorated teams in Italy, historically known for their strong defensive organization and tactical discipline.

name: Inter Milan
description: Football Club Internazionale Milano, commonly referred to as Internazionale or Inter, is an Italian professional football club based in Milan, Lombardy. Known for their tactical versatility and strong defensive organization.

name: AC Milan
description: Associazione Calcio Milan, commonly referred to as AC Milan or simply Milan, is a professional football club based in Milan, Lombardy, Italy. One of the most successful clubs in European football history, known for evolving styles throughout different eras.

name: Ajax
description: Amsterdamsche Football Club Ajax, also known as AFC Ajax or simply Ajax, is a Dutch professional football club based in Amsterdam. Known for their academy and commitment to attacking, possession-based football in the tradition of Total Football.

name: FC Porto
description: FC Porto is a Portuguese professional sports club based in Porto. One of Portugal's 'Big Three' clubs, known for their strong defensive organization and effective counter-attacking play.

name: Benfica
description: Sport Lisboa e Benfica, commonly known as Benfica, is a professional football club based in Lisbon, Portugal. The club is known for producing technical players and their attacking style of play.

name: Celtic
description: Celtic Football Club is a Scottish professional football club based in Glasgow. One of the two major teams in the Scottish Premiership, known for their attacking style and dominance in Scottish football.
